resources.string: The West Family (Rich, Karen, Peter and Sophie) went for a bike ride in the Borderland State Park trails in Easton in October 2013. We stopped by a small waterfall created by a dam for the pond for a rest and a drink from our water bottles, before continuing on in this picture.
Borderland State Park Bike Ride, Easton,MA,USA

The West Family (Rich, Karen, Peter and Sophie) climbed to the top of the tower at Warwick Castle, England, in July 2013, not far from where Rich grew up in Derby,England. Warwick Castle was built in wood in 1068, but transformed into stone in 1215. There were no elevators or air conditioners back then, so the West Family were very hot and sticky when they reached the top of Warwick Castle this summer!
